subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: DeAndre Liggins’s 3-pointer with 37 seconds left sealed the Wildcats’ win over North Carolina, sending them to the national semifinals for the 14th time, and first since 1998.
snippet: DeAndre Liggins’s 3-pointer with 37 seconds left sealed the Wildcats’ win over North Carolina, sending them to the national semifinals for the 14th time, and first since 1998.
